channel.title: Looking for any english ppl that can help me analyze a poem
channel.description:
Hi, im exams are coming up and ive been pushed to the limit. Ive had no time whats so ever to prepare an oral presentation on one of Ted Hughes poems that I have to do and im desprate for help. Its called warm and cold and is writen (as i said) buy ted hughes. Heres a link to it http://www.poemhunter.com/p/m/poem.asp?poet=6616&poem=29462
If anyone whos good at poetry could have a look at that and give me a few words of advise as to what its about, id much appreciate it. One thing to note, Ted Hughes almost always draws a metaphor between human behavour and nature showing how nature is superior, Its this im looking for. Thank you in advance anyone able to help.[br][size=1]Posted at: May 31, 2006, 03:43:27 am[/size][hr]this is an urgent bump. if anyone can help, plz do. Common english buffs.

item.title: Looking for any english ppl that can help me analyze a poem
item.dc:creator: @_DEAD *DEAD*
item.description:
@_DEAD wrote:

reply ive seen that, however im not going to spend $5 on a crappily written piece of work. Btw, I actually am capable of analyzing this thing and making my own readings, however Id like to have alternative readings to my own which i can also present. thanks to anyone who replys within the next hour or so, lol.

Read full topic
